page.title: 07Nursery School,Wolverhampton
page.content: When I was 3 years old,I went to Whitgreave Nursery School.On my first day I wasn't looking forward to going.I can remember I was crying because my mom had to leave.Every one was friendly to me but I just said nothing,not even "hello", I just smiled.First of all my friends and teachers introduced themselves to me,and then at last I told them my name.We started the day by having a hymn.Then I had some biscuits and milk.I also remember there was a bunk bed.I use to climb the ladder and jump on the bed.I usually banged my head on the ceiling! I enjoyed myself that day playing with the toys and paints.There was also a sand pit.I was very naughty because I threw sand at my friends.I didn't want to go back home again.I said goodbye to my friends and teachers.Then my mom came to take me home.I told her what happened that day.
